trans-unit.source: Provides a set of <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組 <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Shared" />) 方法，用於查詢實作 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> 的資料結構。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods declared in the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> class provides an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 中的一組方法宣告<xref:System.Linq.Queryable>類別提供的標準查詢運算子實作查詢的資料來源實作<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>。

trans-unit.source: The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language.
trans-unit.target: 標準查詢運算子是一般用途的方法，請遵循[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，並讓您透過任何表示周遊、 篩選和投射作業。以網路為基礎的程式設計語言。

trans-unit.source: The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別中方法的大部分會定義為延伸的延伸模組方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>型別。

trans-unit.source: This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您可以在實作任何物件上呼叫執行個體方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>。

trans-unit.source: These methods that extend <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> do not perform any querying directly.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法來擴充<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>不會執行任何直接查詢。

trans-unit.source: Instead, their functionality is to build an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> object, which is an expression tree that represents the cumulative query.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，其功能是建置<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression>物件，這是表示累計查詢運算式樹狀架構。

trans-unit.source: The methods then pass the new expression tree to either the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method or the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the input <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 方法接著會將新的運算式樹狀結構傳遞給這<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法或<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法的輸入<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>。

trans-unit.source: The method that is called depends on whether the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> method returns a singleton value, in which case <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> is called, or has enumerable results, in which case <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的方法取決於是否<xref:System.Linq.Queryable>方法會傳回單一值，在此情況下<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>呼叫時，或可列舉結果，在此情況下<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The actual query execution on the target data is performed by a class that implements <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 目標資料的實際查詢執行所實作的類別執行<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>。

trans-unit.source: The expectation of any <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> implementation is that the result of executing an expression tree that was constructed by a <xref:System.Linq.Queryable> standard query operator method is equivalent to the result of calling the corresponding method in the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> class, if the data source were an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 期望的任何<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>實作是執行運算式樹狀架構，由所建構的結果<xref:System.Linq.Queryable>標準查詢運算子方法相當於對應的方法呼叫的結果<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable>如果資料來源類別<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the standard query operator methods that operate on <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> objects, this class also contains a method, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%2A>, which types <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> objects as <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 除了運作的標準查詢運算子方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>物件，這個類別也包含一種方法， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%2A>，哪些類型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>物件當做<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: A sequence to aggregate over.
trans-unit.target: 所要彙總的序列。

trans-unit.source: An accumulator function to apply to each element.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到每個項目的累加函式。

trans-unit.source: Applies an accumulator function over a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 將累加函式套用到序列上。

trans-unit.source: The final accumulator value.
trans-unit.target: 最終累積值。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是指定的函式， `func`，套用至每個值中的來源順序，並累積值。

trans-unit.source: The first value in `source` is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`.
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個值`source`作為累積的值，對應中的第一個參數的初始值`func`。

trans-unit.source: To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Count%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%2A>, and four numeric aggregation methods, namely <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Max%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Sum%2A>, and <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，一組標準查詢運算子，也包含兩個計數的方法，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Count%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%2A>，和四個數值彙總方法，也就是<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Max%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Sum%2A>，和<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29> to build a sentence from an array of strings.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%7D%7D%29>建置的字串陣列的句子。

trans-unit.target: 將累加函式套用到序列上。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.target: `seed`的累積的值，對應到第一個參數中使用參數做為種子值`func`。

trans-unit.source: To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Count%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%2A>, and four numeric aggregation methods, namely <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Max%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Sum%2A>, and <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，一組標準查詢運算子，也包含兩個計數的方法，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Count%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%2A>，和四個數值彙總方法，也就是<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Max%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Sum%2A>，和<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29> to apply an accumulator function when a seed value is provided to the function.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29>時要套用將累加函式的種子值提供給函數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是指定的函式， `func`，套用至每個值中的來源順序，並累積值。

trans-unit.source: The `seed` parameter is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`.
trans-unit.target: `seed`的累積的值，對應到第一個參數中使用參數做為種子值`func`。

trans-unit.source: The final accumulated value is passed to `selector` to obtain the result value.
trans-unit.target: 最終累積的值傳遞至`selector`取得結果值。

trans-unit.source: To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Count%2A> and <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%2A>, and four numeric aggregation methods, namely <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Max%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Sum%2A>, and <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，一組標準查詢運算子，也包含兩個計數的方法，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Count%2A>和<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%2A>，和四個數值彙總方法，也就是<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Max%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Sum%2A>，和<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29> to apply an accumulator function and a result selector.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Aggregate%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%601%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29>套用將累加函式和結果選取器。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: A sequence whose elements to test for a condition.

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether all the elements of a sequence satisfy a condition.
trans-unit.target: 判斷序列的所有項目是否全都符合條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if every element of the source sequence passes the test in the specified predicate, or if the sequence is empty; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果來源序列的每個項目都通過以指定之述詞 (Predicate) 進行的測試，或序列是空的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the `source` parameter's type.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>的實作而定`source`參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it determines if all the elements in `source` satisfy the condition in `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會決定是否所有中的項目`source`符合之條件的`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to determine whether all the elements in a sequence satisfy a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>來判斷序列中的所有項目是否符合條件。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value that the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method returns is typically used in the predicate of a `where` clause (`Where` clause in Visual Basic) or a direct call to the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.All%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會傳回最常用的述詞在`where`子句 (`Where`子句在 Visual Basic 中的) 或直接呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates this use of the `All` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這種使用`All`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Any%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to determine whether a sequence contains any elements.

trans-unit.source: A sequence to convert.
trans-unit.target: 所要轉換的序列。

trans-unit.source: Converts an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> to an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> that represents the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 代表輸入序列的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" />。

trans-unit.source: If the type of `source` implements <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%29> returns it directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果類型`source`實作<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%28System.Collections.IEnumerable%29>會直接傳回。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> that executes queries by calling the equivalent query operator methods in <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> instead of those in <xref:System.Linq.Queryable>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>藉由呼叫對等查詢運算子方法中的執行查詢<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable>而不是在<xref:System.Linq.Queryable>。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `source` implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> for some `T`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會假設`source`實作<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>某些`T`。

trans-unit.source: At runtime, the result is of type <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> for the same `T`.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，則結果會是類型<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>同一個`T`。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful in dynamic scenarios when you do not statically know the type of `T`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相當實用動態案例中，當您無法以靜態方式知道的型別`T`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> does not implement <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> for some <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 不會針對某些 <paramref name="T" /> 實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that represents the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 代表輸入序列的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: If the type of `source` implements <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> returns it directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果類型`source`實作<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>會直接傳回。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> that executes queries by calling the equivalent query operator methods in <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable> instead of those in <xref:System.Linq.Queryable>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>藉由呼叫對等查詢運算子方法中的執行查詢<xref:System.Linq.Enumerable>而不是在<xref:System.Linq.Queryable>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to convert an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> to an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable%60%601%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>轉換<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Computes the average of a sequence of numeric values.
trans-unit.target: 計算數值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> values to calculate the average of.
trans-unit.target: 要計算平均值的 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值序列。

trans-unit.source: Computes the average of a sequence of <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 計算 <see cref="T:System.Decimal" /> 值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: The average of the sequence of values.
trans-unit.target: 值序列的平均。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7BSystem.Decimal%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7BSystem.Decimal%7D%29> itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7BSystem.Decimal%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7BSystem.Decimal%7D%29>本身。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7BSystem.Decimal%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Average%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7BSystem.Decimal%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it calculates the average of the values in `source`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會計算中值的平均值`source`。

trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns `source` if it is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回`source`如果不是空白。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> that contains `default(TSource)`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會傳回<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>包含`default(TSource)`。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to provide a default value in case the source sequence is empty.

trans-unit.source: The value to return if the sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 在序列空白時所要傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the elements of the specified sequence or the specified value in a singleton collection if the sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之序列的項目；如果序列是空的，則傳回單一集合中型別參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains <paramref name="defaultValue" /> if <paramref name="source" /> is empty; otherwise, <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="defaultValue" /> 是空的，則為包含 <paramref name="source" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，否則為 <paramref name="source" />。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns `source` if it is not empty.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Produces the set difference of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 產生兩個序列的差異。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 輸入序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> whose elements that are not also in <c>source2</c> will be returned.

trans-unit.target: 傳回序列的第一個元素；如果序列中沒有包含任何元素，則傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />) if <paramref name="source" /> is empty; otherwise, the first element in <paramref name="source" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the first element in `source`, or a default value if `source` is empty.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回第一個元素`source`，或預設值，如果`source`是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%2A> method does not provide a way to specify the default value to return if `source` is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%2A>方法不會提供方法來指定要傳回的預設值`source`是空的。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method as described in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>範例 > 一節中所述的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> on an empty sequence.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>空序列上。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 有時候值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 不檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並再將它如有必要變更，您可以改用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Then, call <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.First%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the first element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.First%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>取得第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric months is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值是 1，如果數字月份的集合是空的。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 因為整數的預設值為 0，不會對應到任何月份，預設值必須被指定為 1。

trans-unit.source: The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query is completed.
trans-unit.target: 查詢完成後不想要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。

trans-unit.source: The second result variable is obtained by calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> to specify a default value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 第二個結果變數透過呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>來指定預設值是 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試每個項目是否符合條件的函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition or a default value if no such element is found.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中符合指定之條件的第一個項目；如果找不到這類項目，則傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />) if <paramref name="source" /> is empty or if no element passes the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />; otherwise, the first element in <paramref name="source" /> that passes the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="source" /> 是空的，或是沒有任何項目通過 <paramref name="predicate" /> 所指定的測試，則為 <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />)；否則為 <paramref name="source" /> 中通過 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定之測試的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the first element in `source` that satisfies the condition in `predicate`, or a default value if no element satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回第一個元素`source`，可滿足的條件`predicate`，或如果沒有任何項目符合條件的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> by passing in a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.FirstOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>藉由傳遞述詞。

trans-unit.source: In the second query, there is no element in the sequence that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個查詢中，沒有任何項目中符合條件的順序。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it groups the elements of `source` by a key value that is obtained by invoking `keySelector` on each element.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it groups the elements of `source` by a key value that is obtained by invoking `keySelector` on each element.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是該群組的項目`source`依據索引鍵值，藉由叫用`keySelector`上每個項目。

trans-unit.source: It invokes `elementSelector` on each element to obtain a result element.
trans-unit.target: 它會叫用`elementSelector`上每個項目，以取得結果項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29> to group the elements of a sequence.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> whose elements to group.
trans-unit.target: 要群組其項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the key for each element.

trans-unit.target: 用來比較金鑰的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence and projects the elements for each group by using a specified function.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的函式來群組序列的項目並投影每個群組的項目。

trans-unit.source: Key values are compared by using a specified comparer.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵值是使用指定的比較子來進行比較。

trans-unit.source: An <c>IQueryable<IGrouping<TKey, TElement>></c> in C# or <c>IQueryable(Of IGrouping(Of TKey, TElement))</c> in Visual Basic where each <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> contains a sequence of objects of type <paramref name="TElement" /> and a key.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupBy%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it groups the elements of `source` by key values that are obtained by invoking `keySelector` on each element.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是該群組的項目`source`所叫用所取得的索引鍵值`keySelector`上每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The `comparer` parameter is used to compare keys and the `resultSelector` parameter is used to obtain a result value from each group and its key.
trans-unit.target: `comparer`參數用來比較索引鍵和`resultSelector`參數用來從每個群組及其索引鍵取得結果值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="keySelector" /> or <paramref name="resultSelector" /> or <paramref name="comparer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" />、<paramref name="keySelector" />、<paramref name="resultSelector" /> 或 <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the key returned by the function represented in <c>keySelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 表示函數所傳回的索引鍵類型<c>keySelector</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements in each <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 每個 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 中的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result value returned by <c>resultSelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果值的型別<c>resultSelector</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> whose elements to group.
trans-unit.target: 要群組其項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the key for each element.
trans-unit.target: 用來擷取各項目之索引鍵的函式。

trans-unit.source: A function to map each source element to an element in an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來將每個來源項目對應至 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" /> 之項目的函式。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result value from each group.
trans-unit.target: 用來從各個群組建立結果值的函式。

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function and creates a result value from each group and its key.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的索引鍵選取器函式來群組序列的項目，並從每個群組及其索引鍵建立結果值。

trans-unit.source: The elements of each group are projected by using a specified function.
trans-unit.target: 每個群組的項目都是利用指定的函式進行投影。

trans-unit.source: An <c>T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1</c> that has a type argument of <paramref name="TResult" /> and where each element represents a projection over a group and its key.
trans-unit.target: <c>T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1</c>，其具有 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的型別引數，而且其中每個項目都代表群組及其索引鍵的投影。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it groups the elements of `source` by key values that are obtained by invoking `keySelector` on each element.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是該群組的項目`source`所叫用所取得的索引鍵值`keySelector`上每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The `elementSelector` parameter is used to project the elements of each group, and the `resultSelector` parameter is used to obtain a result value from each group and its key.
trans-unit.target: `elementSelector`參數用來將專案的每個群組中，項目和`resultSelector`參數用來從每個群組及其索引鍵取得結果值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" />、<paramref name="keySelector" />、<paramref name="elementSelector" />、<paramref name="resultSelector" /> 或 <paramref name="comparer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on key equality and groups the results.
trans-unit.target: 根據索引鍵相等與否，將兩個序列的項目相互關聯，並群組產生的結果。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第一個序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第二個序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the keys returned by the key selector functions.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵選取器函式所傳回之索引鍵的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result elements.
trans-unit.target: 結果項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The first sequence to join.
trans-unit.target: 要聯結的第一個序列。

trans-unit.source: The sequence to join to the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要加入第一個序列的序列。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用來從第一個序列各個項目擷取聯結索引鍵的函式。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用來從第二個序列各個項目擷取聯結索引鍵的函式。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result element from an element from the first sequence and a collection of matching elements from the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 函式，用來從第一個序列的項目以及第二個序列的相符項目集合建立結果項目。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on key equality and groups the results.
trans-unit.target: 根據索引鍵相等與否，將兩個序列的項目相互關聯，並群組產生的結果。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 預設的相等比較子是用於比較索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> obtained by performing a grouped join on two sequences.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含透過對兩個序列執行群組聯結所取得之型別 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `outer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`outer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`outer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，`outerKeySelector`和`innerKeySelector`函數用來擷取索引鍵從`outer`和`inner`分別。

trans-unit.source: These keys are compared for equality to match each element in `outer` with zero or more elements from `inner`.
trans-unit.target: 這些金鑰會比較比對中的每個項目是否相等`outer`的零或多個項目和`inner`。

trans-unit.source: Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each group of correlated elements.
trans-unit.target: 然後在`resultSelector`函式會叫用投影的結果物件，從每個群組的相互關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> to perform a grouped join on two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>執行群組的聯結兩個序列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="outer" /> or <paramref name="inner" /> or <paramref name="outerKeySelector" /> or <paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> or <paramref name="resultSelector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="outer" />、<paramref name="inner" />、<paramref name="outerKeySelector" />、<paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> 或 <paramref name="resultSelector" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A comparer to hash and compare keys.

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on key equality and groups the results.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%602%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%602%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `outer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`outer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%602%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.GroupJoin%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2C%60%603%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%602%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`outer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，`outerKeySelector`和`innerKeySelector`函數用來擷取索引鍵從`outer`和`inner`分別。

trans-unit.source: These keys are compared for equality by using `comparer`.
trans-unit.target: 這些金鑰會使用比較是否相等`comparer`。

trans-unit.source: The outcome of the comparisons is used to match each element in `outer` with zero or more elements from `inner`.
trans-unit.target: 比較的結果用來比對中的每個項目`outer`的零或多個項目和`inner`。

trans-unit.source: Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each group of correlated elements.
trans-unit.target: 然後在`resultSelector`函式會叫用投影的結果物件，從每個群組的相互關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set intersection of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 產生兩個序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 輸入序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: A sequence whose distinct elements that also appear in <c>source2</c> are returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回其獨特項目同時出現在 <c>source2</c> 中的序列。

trans-unit.source: A sequence whose distinct elements that also appear in the first sequence are returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回其獨特項目同時出現在第一個序列中的序列。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set intersection of two sequences by using the default equality comparer to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設相等比較子來比較值，以便產生兩個序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: A sequence that contains the set intersection of the two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 包含兩個序列之交集的序列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source1` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source1`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source1` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source1`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that all the elements in `source1` that are also in `source2` are returned.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，中的所有項目`source1`，這些也在`source2`會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to return the elements that appear in each of two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%29>來傳回在兩個序列的每個出現的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source1" /> or <paramref name="source2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 或 <paramref name="source2" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 輸入序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> whose distinct elements that also appear in <c>source2</c> are returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回其獨特項目同時出現在 <c>source2</c> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> whose distinct elements that also appear in the first sequence are returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回其獨特項目同時出現在第一個序列中的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 用來比較值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Produces the set intersection of two sequences by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> to compare values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer`1" /> 來比較值，以便產生兩個序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains the set intersection of the two sequences.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含兩個序列的交集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source1` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source1`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source1` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Intersect%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source1`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that all the elements in `source1` that are also in `source2` are returned.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，中的所有項目`source1`，這些也在`source2`會傳回。

trans-unit.source: The `comparer` parameter is used to compare elements.
trans-unit.target: `comparer`參數用來比較項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source1" /> or <paramref name="source2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 或 <paramref name="source2" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on matching keys.
trans-unit.target: 根據相符索引鍵，將兩個序列的項目相互關聯。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第一個序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第二個序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the keys returned by the key selector functions.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵選取器函式所傳回之索引鍵的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the result elements.
trans-unit.target: 結果項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: The first sequence to join.
trans-unit.target: 要聯結的第一個序列。

trans-unit.source: The sequence to join to the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要加入第一個序列的序列。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the first sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用來從第一個序列各個項目擷取聯結索引鍵的函式。

trans-unit.source: A function to extract the join key from each element of the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用來從第二個序列各個項目擷取聯結索引鍵的函式。

trans-unit.source: A function to create a result element from two matching elements.
trans-unit.target: 用來從兩個相符項目建立結果項目的函式。

trans-unit.source: Correlates the elements of two sequences based on matching keys.
trans-unit.target: 根據相符索引鍵，將兩個序列的項目相互關聯。

trans-unit.source: The default equality comparer is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: 預設的相等比較子是用於比較索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that has elements of type <paramref name="TResult" /> obtained by performing an inner join on two sequences.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其具有透過對兩個序列執行內部聯結所取得之型別 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `outer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`outer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`outer`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that of an inner join.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是內部聯結。

trans-unit.source: The `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: `outerKeySelector`和`innerKeySelector`函數用來擷取索引鍵從`outer`和`inner`分別。

trans-unit.source: These keys are compared for equality to match elements from each sequence.
trans-unit.target: 這些金鑰會比較比對每個序列中的項目相等。

trans-unit.source: A pair of elements is stored for each element in `inner` that matches an element in `outer`.
trans-unit.target: 中的每個項目會儲存項目的配對`inner`符合中的項目`outer`。

trans-unit.source: Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each pair of matching elements.
trans-unit.target: 然後在`resultSelector`函式會叫用投影結果物件的每個配對的相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29> to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Join%60%604%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%603%7D%7D%29>來執行一般的索引鍵為基礎的兩個序列的內部聯結。
