trans-unit.target: `outerKeySelector`和`innerKeySelector`函數用來擷取索引鍵從`outer`和`inner`分別。

trans-unit.source: These keys are compared for equality by using `comparer`.
trans-unit.target: 這些金鑰會使用比較是否相等`comparer`。

trans-unit.source: The outcome of the comparisons is used to create a matching pair for each element in `inner` that matches an element in `outer`.
trans-unit.target: 比較的結果用來建立每個項目中相符的配對`inner`符合中的項目`outer`。

trans-unit.source: Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each pair of matching elements.
trans-unit.target: 然後在`resultSelector`函式會叫用投影結果物件的每個配對的相符項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="outer" /> or <paramref name="inner" /> or <paramref name="outerKeySelector" /> or <paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> or <paramref name="resultSelector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="outer" />、<paramref name="inner" />、<paramref name="outerKeySelector" />、<paramref name="innerKeySelector" /> 或 <paramref name="resultSelector" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return the last element of.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回最後一個項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element in a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The value at the last position in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 位於 <paramref name="source" /> 中最後一個位置的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the last element in `source`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回最後一個元素`source`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to return the last element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>傳回陣列的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 來源序列為空。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return an element from.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試每個項目是否符合條件的函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中符合指定之條件的最後一個元素。

trans-unit.source: The last element in <paramref name="source" /> that passes the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 中通過 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定之測試的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the last element in `source` that satisfies the condition specified by `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回最後一個元素`source`，可滿足所指定的條件`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to return the last element of an array that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>傳回陣列，符合條件的最後一個元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何項目符合 <paramref name="predicate" /> 的條件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 來源序列為空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element of a sequence, or a default value if no element is found.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列的最後一個項目；如果找不到任何項目，則傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return the last element of.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回最後一個項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the last element in a sequence, or a default value if the sequence contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中的最後一個項目；如果序列中沒有包含任何項目，則傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />) if <paramref name="source" /> is empty; otherwise, the last element in <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="source" /> 是空的，則為 <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />)；否則為 <paramref name="source" /> 中的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the last element in `source`, or a default value if `source` is empty.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回最後一個元素`source`，或預設值，如果`source`是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%2A> method does not provide a way to specify a default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%2A>方法不會提供方法來指定預設值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method as described in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>範例 > 一節中所述的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> on an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>上的空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 有時候值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 不檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並再將它如有必要變更，您可以改用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Then, call <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the last element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Last%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>取得最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值是 1，如果數字的每月天數的集合是空的。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 因為整數的預設值為 0，沒有對應的當月的任何一天，預設值必須被指定為 1。

trans-unit.source: The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query is completed.
trans-unit.target: 查詢完成後不想要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。

trans-unit.source: The second result variable is obtained by calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> to specify a default value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 第二個結果變數透過呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>來指定預設值是 1。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the last element in `source` that satisfies the condition specified by `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回最後一個元素`source`，可滿足所指定的條件`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: It returns a default value if there is no such element in `source`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類項目中的，它會傳回預設值`source`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> by passing in a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LastOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>藉由傳遞述詞。

trans-unit.source: In the second call to the method, there is no element in the sequence that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個呼叫方法時，沒有任何項目中符合條件的順序。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.LongCount%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it invokes `selector` on each element in `source` and returns the minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會叫用`selector`中每個項目上`source`並傳回最小值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29> to determine the minimum value in a sequence of projected values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Min%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29>來判斷序列中預計值的最小值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="selector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="selector" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to filter the elements of the sequence on.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> whose elements to filter.

trans-unit.source: Filters the elements of an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> based on a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的型別來篩選 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.target: 集合，其中包含 <paramref name="source" /> 中型別為 <paramref name="TResult" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: The `OfType` method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling `OfType` itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: `OfType`方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫`OfType`本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling `OfType` depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為`OfType`之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it filters out any elements in `source` that are not of type `TResult`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會篩選掉任何項目`source`，不是型別`TResult`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use `OfType` to filter out elements that are not of type <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> from a list of elements of type <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it sorts the elements of `source` in descending order, based on the key obtained by invoking `keySelector` on each element of `source`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是排序的項目`source`以遞減順序，根據 藉由叫用的索引鍵`keySelector`的每個項目上`source`。

trans-unit.source: The `comparer` parameter is used to compare keys.
trans-unit.target: `comparer`參數用來比較索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29> to sort the elements of a sequence in descending order by using a custom comparer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IComparer%7B%60%601%7D%29>排序序列中使用自訂比較子，依遞減順序的項目。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it invokes `selector` on each element of `source` to project it into an enumerable form.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會叫用`selector`的每個項目上`source`投影成可列舉的格式。

trans-unit.source: It then concatenates the enumerable results into a single, one-dimensional sequence.
trans-unit.target: 然後將可列舉結果串連成單一的一維的序列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29> to perform a one-to-many projection over an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29>對陣列進行反覆執行的一對多投影。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="selector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="selector" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of values to project.
trans-unit.target: 要投影的值序列。

trans-unit.source: A projection function to apply to each element; the second parameter of this function represents the index of the source element.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到每個項目的投影函式；此函式的第二個參數代表來源項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Projects each element of a sequence to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> and combines the resulting sequences into one sequence.
trans-unit.target: 將序列的每個項目都投影成 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，並將產生的序列合併成一個序列。

trans-unit.source: The index of each source element is used in the projected form of that element.
trans-unit.target: 各來源項目的索引是在該項目的投影表單中使用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> whose elements are the result of invoking a one-to-many projection function on each element of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其項目是對輸入序列中各個項目叫用一對多投影函式後所產生的結果。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it invokes `selector` on each element of `source` to project it into an enumerable form.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會叫用`selector`的每個項目上`source`投影成可列舉的格式。

trans-unit.source: Each enumerable result incorporates the index of the source element.
trans-unit.target: 每個列舉的結果會合併來源項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: It then concatenates the enumerable results into a single, one-dimensional sequence.
trans-unit.target: 然後將可列舉結果串連成單一的一維的序列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29> to perform a one-to-many projection over an array and use the index of each source element.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%602%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%29>對陣列進行反覆執行的一對多投影，並使用每個來源項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="selector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="selector" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the intermediate elements collected by the function represented by <c>collectionSelector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的函式所收集的中繼項目類型<c>collectionSelector</c>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the resulting sequence.
trans-unit.target: 產生的序列之項目型別。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of values to project.
trans-unit.target: 要投影的值序列。

trans-unit.source: A projection function to apply to each element of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到輸入序列中各個項目的投影函式。

trans-unit.source: A projection function to apply to each element of each intermediate sequence.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到各中繼序列之各個項目的投影函式。

trans-unit.source: Projects each element of a sequence to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> and invokes a result selector function on each element therein.
trans-unit.target: 將序列的每個項目投影成 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，並在其中的每個項目上叫用結果選取器函式。

trans-unit.source: The resulting values from each intermediate sequence are combined into a single, one-dimensional sequence and returned.
trans-unit.target: 每個中繼序列產生的值都會合併成單一的一維序列，然後再傳回。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> whose elements are the result of invoking the one-to-many projection function <paramref name="collectionSelector" /> on each element of <paramref name="source" /> and then mapping each of those sequence elements and their corresponding <paramref name="source" /> element to a result element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其項目是執行下列動作後所產生的結果：對 <paramref name="collectionSelector" /> 的各個項目叫用一對多投影函式 <paramref name="source" />，然後再將每個序列項目及其對應之 <paramref name="source" /> 項目對應到結果項目。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it invokes `collectionSelector` on each element of `source` to project it into an enumerable form.

trans-unit.source: Then the function represented by `resultSelector` is invoked on each element in each intermediate sequence.
trans-unit.target: 然後函式由`resultSelector`每個中繼時序中的每個項目上叫用。

trans-unit.source: The resulting values are concatenated into a single, one-dimensional sequence.
trans-unit.target: 產生的值會串連成單一的一維的序列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SelectMany%60%603%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%601%7D%7D%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%2C%60%602%7D%7D%29> to perform a one-to-many projection over an array.

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it invokes `collectionSelector` on each element of `source` to project it into an enumerable form.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會叫用`collectionSelector`的每個項目上`source`投影成可列舉的格式。

trans-unit.source: Each enumerable result incorporates the source element's index.
trans-unit.target: 每個列舉的結果會合併來源項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Then the function represented by `resultSelector` is invoked on each element in each intermediate sequence.
trans-unit.target: 然後函式由`resultSelector`每個中繼時序中的每個項目上叫用。

trans-unit.source: The resulting values are concatenated into a single, one-dimensional sequence.
trans-unit.target: 產生的值會串連成單一的一維的序列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="collectionSelector" /> or <paramref name="resultSelector" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" />、<paramref name="collectionSelector" /> 或 <paramref name="resultSelector" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two sequences are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個序列是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the input sequences.
trans-unit.target: 輸入序列之項目的類型。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其項目要與 <c>source2</c> 的項目比較。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" />，其項目要與第一個序列的項目比較。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two sequences are equal by using the default equality comparer to compare elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設相等比較子來比較項目，以判斷兩個序列是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two source sequences are of equal length and their corresponding elements compare equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個來源序列的長度相同，而且其對應項目比較結果相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence, and throws an exception if there is not exactly one element in the sequence.

trans-unit.source: A function to test an element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試項目是否符合條件的函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition, and throws an exception if more than one such element exists.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中符合指定之條件的唯一一個元素，如果有一個以上這類元素，則擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 輸入序列中符合 <paramref name="predicate" /> 之條件的單一項目。

The source sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 來源序列為空。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single, specific element of a sequence, or a default value if no such element is found.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列的單一特定項目；如果找不到任何項目，則傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return the single element of.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回單一項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence, or a default value if the sequence is empty; this method throws an exception if there is more than one element in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列的唯一一個項目，如果序列是空白，則為預設值，如果序列中有一個以上的項目，這個方法就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The single element of the input sequence, or <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />) if the sequence contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 輸入序列的單一項目，如果序列不包含任何項目，則為 <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the only element in `source`, or a default value if `source` is empty.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回唯一的項目中`source`，或預設值，如果`source`是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%2A> method does not provide a way to specify a default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%2A>方法不會提供方法來指定預設值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method as described in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>範例 > 一節中所述的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to select the only element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>選取陣列中的唯一項目。

trans-unit.source: The second query demonstrates that <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> returns a default value when the sequence does not contain exactly one element.
trans-unit.target: 第二個查詢示範<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>序列不包含剛好只有一個項目時，傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements.
trans-unit.target: 有時候值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 不檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並再將它如有必要變更，您可以改用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Then, call <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Single%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29> to obtain the element.
trans-unit.target: 然後，呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Single%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%29>若要取得的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of page numbers is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值是 1，如果是空的頁面數字集合。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value for an integer is 0, which is not usually a valid page number, the default value must be specified as 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 因為整數的預設值為 0，但通常並不正確的頁碼，預設值必須被指定為 1。

trans-unit.source: The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query is completed.
trans-unit.target: 查詢完成後不想要的預設值會檢查第一個結果變數。

trans-unit.source: The second result variable is obtained by calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29> to specify a default value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 第二個結果變數透過呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.DefaultIfEmpty%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2C%60%600%29>來指定預設值是 1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> has more than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 具有多個項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return a single element from.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回單一項目的來源 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test an element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試項目是否符合條件的函式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the only element of a sequence that satisfies a specified condition or a default value if no such element exists; this method throws an exception if more than one element satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中符合指定之條件的唯一一個元素，如果沒有這類元素，則為預設值，如果有一個以上的元素符合條件，這個方法就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The single element of the input sequence that satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />, or <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />) if no such element is found.
trans-unit.target: 輸入序列中符合 <paramref name="predicate" /> 條件的單一項目，如果找不到這類項目，則為 <c>default</c>(<paramref name="TSource" />)。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.Execute%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the only element in `source` that satisfies the condition specified by `predicate`, or a default value if no such element exists.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回唯一的項目中`source`，可滿足所指定的條件`predicate`，則為預設值，如果沒有這類元素存在。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to select the only element of an array that satisfies a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>選取唯一的項目滿足條件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The second query demonstrates that <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> returns a default value when the sequence does not contain exactly one element that satisfies the condition.
trans-unit.target: 第二個查詢示範<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SingleOrDefault%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>序列不包含剛好只有一個項目符合條件時傳回預設值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: More than one element satisfies the condition in <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 超過一個項目符合 <paramref name="predicate" /> 中的條件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to skip before returning the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回其餘項目之前要略過的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses a specified number of elements in a sequence and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 略過序列中指定的項目數目，然後傳回其餘項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains elements that occur after the specified index in the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含出現在輸入序列中指定之索引後面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it skips the first `count` elements in `source` and returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會略過第一個`count`中的項目`source`並傳回其餘項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29> to skip a specified number of elements in a sorted array and return the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Skip%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29>來略過指定的已排序陣列中的項目數，並傳回其餘項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 只要指定的條件為 true，便略過序列中的項目，然後傳回其餘項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試每個項目是否符合條件的函式。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 只要指定的條件為 true，便略過序列中的項目，然後傳回其餘項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains elements from <paramref name="source" /> starting at the first element in the linear series that does not pass the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含的項目位於 <paramref name="source" />，而且是從沒有通過 <paramref name="predicate" /> 所指定之測試的線性系列中第一個項目開始。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it applies `predicate` to each element in `source` until it finds an element for which `predicate` returns false.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，適用於`predicate`中每個項目`source`它找到的項目，直到`predicate`傳回 false。

trans-unit.source: That element and all the remaining elements are returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目和所有剩餘的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to skip elements of an array as long as a condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>條件為 true 時，略過的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to return elements from.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition; the second parameter of this function represents the index of the source element.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試各項目是否符合條件的函式；此函式的第二個參數代表來源項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 只要指定的條件為 true，便略過序列中的項目，然後傳回其餘項目。

trans-unit.source: The element's index is used in the logic of the predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 項目的索引是用於述詞功能的邏輯中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains elements from <paramref name="source" /> starting at the first element in the linear series that does not pass the test specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含的項目位於 <paramref name="source" />，而且是從沒有通過 <paramref name="predicate" /> 所指定之測試的線性系列中第一個項目開始。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it applies `predicate` to each element in `source` until it finds an element for which `predicate` returns false.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，適用於`predicate`中每個項目`source`它找到的項目，直到`predicate`傳回 false。

trans-unit.source: That element and all the remaining elements are returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目和所有剩餘的項目。

trans-unit.source: The index of each source element is provided as the second argument to `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 各來源項目的索引提供做為第二個引數`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to skip elements of an array as long as a condition that depends on the element's index is true.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.SkipWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>取決於項目的索引條件為 true 時，略過的陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a specified number of contiguous elements from the start of a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 從序列開頭傳回指定的連續項目數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains the specified number of elements from the start of <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含來自 <paramref name="source" /> 開頭的指定項目數目。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Take%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Take%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it takes the first `count` elements from the start of `source`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會採用第一個`count`從開頭的項目`source`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Take%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Int32%29> to return elements from the start of a sequence.

trans-unit.source: Returns elements from a sequence as long as a specified condition is true.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it applies `predicate` to each element in `source` until it finds an element for which `predicate` returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，適用於`predicate`中每個項目`source`它找到的項目，直到`predicate`傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: It returns all the elements up until that point.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回所有項目，直到該時間點。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.TakeWhile%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to return elements from the start of a sequence as long as a condition is true.

trans-unit.source: Performs a subsequent ordering of the elements in a sequence in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 依遞增順序，執行序列中項目的後續排序作業。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it performs a secondary sort of the elements of `source` based on the key obtained by invoking `keySelector` on each element of `source`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是它會執行第二個項目的排序`source`藉由叫用的索引鍵為基礎`keySelector`的每個項目上`source`。

trans-unit.source: All previously established sort orders are preserved.
trans-unit.target: 所有先前建立的排序順序都會保留下來。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%60%602%28System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%7D%29> to perform a secondary ordering of the elements in a sequence.

trans-unit.source: Produces the set union of two sequences by using the default equality comparer.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設相等比較值來比較值，以便產生兩個序列的集合等位。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source1` parameter.

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Union%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source1` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Union%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEqualityComparer%7B%60%600%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source1`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that the set union of the elements in `source1` and `source2` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，中的項目聯集`source1`和`source2`傳回。

trans-unit.source: The `comparer` parameter is used to compare values.
trans-unit.target: `comparer`參數用來比較值。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 或 <paramref name="source2" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Filters a sequence of values based on a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 根據述詞來篩選值序列。

trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.target: 要篩選的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.target: 用來測試每個項目是否符合條件的函式。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the elements from `source` that satisfy the condition specified by `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回項目從`source`符合所指定的條件`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to filter a sequence.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>來篩選序列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of <c>source</c>.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別<c>來源</c>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> to filter.
trans-unit.target: 要篩選的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A function to test each element for a condition; the second parameter of the function represents the index of the element in the source sequence.
trans-unit.target: 用來測試各項目是否符合條件的函式；此函式的第二個參數代表來源序列中項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Filters a sequence of values based on a predicate.
trans-unit.target: 根據述詞來篩選值序列。

trans-unit.source: Each element's index is used in the logic of the predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 述詞函式的邏輯中使用各項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains elements from the input sequence that satisfy the condition specified by <paramref name="predicate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含輸入序列中符合 <paramref name="predicate" /> 指定之條件的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method has at least one parameter of type <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601> whose type argument is one of the <xref:System.Func%602> types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經至少一個參數的型別<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>其型別引數是其中一個<xref:System.Func%602>型別。

trans-unit.source: For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>.
trans-unit.target: 這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，而且將會編譯為<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因執行運算式樹狀結構，表示呼叫的查詢行為<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>之類型的實作而定`source`參數。

trans-unit.source: The expected behavior is that it returns the elements from `source` that satisfy the condition specified by `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 預期的行為是，它會傳回項目從`source`符合所指定的條件`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: The index of each source element is provided as the second argument to `predicate`.
trans-unit.target: 各來源項目的索引提供做為第二個引數`predicate`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29> to filter a sequence based on a predicate that incorporates the index of each element.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Where%60%601%28System.Linq.IQueryable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Linq.Expressions.Expression%7BSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%7D%7D%29>來篩選序列根據述詞，其中包含每個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="predicate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 或 <paramref name="predicate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the first input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第一個輸入序列的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the second input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 第二個輸入序列的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the elements of the result sequence.
trans-unit.target: 結果序列的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The first sequence to merge.
trans-unit.target: 要合併的第一個序列。

trans-unit.source: The second sequence to merge.
trans-unit.target: 要合併的第二個序列。

trans-unit.source: A function that specifies how to merge the elements from the two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何從兩個序列合併項目的函式。

trans-unit.source: Merges two sequences by using the specified predicate function.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的述詞函式來合併兩個序列。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" /> that contains merged elements of two input sequences.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable`1" />，其中包含兩個輸入序列的合併項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Zip%2A> method generates a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> that represents calling <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Zip%2A> itself as a constructed generic method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Zip%2A>方法會產生<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>，代表呼叫<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Zip%2A>本身做為建構的泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression> to the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> method of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider> represented by the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A> property of the `source1` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 接著，將<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression>至<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>方法<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider>由<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable.Provider%2A>屬性`source1`參數。

trans-unit.source: The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將合併的第一個序列的每個項目，與具有相同的索引，第二個序列中的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列沒有相同數目的項目，方法會將序列，直到達到其中一個的結尾。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the resulting sequence will have only three elements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一個序列的方式有三項目，另一個有四個，所產生的順序必須只有三個項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Zip%2A> method to merge two sequences.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.Zip%2A>方法來合併兩個序列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source1" /> or <paramref name="source2" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source1" /> 或 <paramref name="source2" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
